db:abstract.db:para: A gradient with additive color effect.

db:para.db:emphasis: This type is deprecated since 6.5. We strongly advise against using it in new code.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description

db:warning.db:para: All pre-made standalone effects in QtQuick3D.Effects are considered deprecated starting with Qt 6.5. To perform color adjustments and color grading, use ExtendedSceneEnvironment instead.

db:section.db:para: This effect adds a vertical gradient to the whole scene, then additively blends it with all other elements on the layer. Additive blending adds the pixel values of the gradient and the layer, making the result lighter. White areas do not change, and black areas are the same color as the gradient.

db:section.db:title: bottomColor : vector3d
db:section.db:para: The color to be used at the bottom of the screen for the gradient. The default is Qt.vector3d(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) (i.e. black).

db:section.db:title: topColor : vector3d
db:section.db:para: The color to be used at the top of the screen for the gradient. The default value is Qt.vector3d(1.0, 1.0, 1.0) (i.e. white).
